channel.title: Special being weird
channel.description: K, i got my dds spec to hit twice, but its throwing NullPointerExceptions if i use the void SpecDamg(damage) so i changed it to hitDiff and hitupdate but i still get NullPointerExceptions, and now the 2nd hit always equals the first one any ideas?
